text: Towahagula wanhu kumi hali miya imwe kulawa nhanzi zeng'ha za Isilaeli na wanhu miya imwe kuli wanhu elufu imwe na wanhu elufu imwe kuli wanhu elufu kumi, leka walute kuwaholela wanhu vilyo, leka hala howofika Gibeya ya Benjamini, wahiluse chibida kwa chila chinhu cha kuwabasa soni chowaditile kuli isi ya Isilaeli.‚Äù
